languages.text: "Это утверждение истинно. То, что многие считают оковами на пути нашего постижения, является нашей броней, унаследованной от благословленных мудростью предтеч".
"This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение истинно. То, что многие считают оковами на пути нашего постижения, является нашей броней, унаследованной от благословленных мудростью предтеч".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。许多人会认为，某些东西是我们领悟之路上的枷锁，但那其实是我们的盔甲，是从受到祝福的先人那里继承而来的。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。许多人会认为，某些东西是我们领悟之路上的枷锁，但那其实是我们的盔甲，是从受到祝福的先人那里继承而来的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Lo que muchos consideran que nos encadena y lastra en nuestro camino a la comprensión es una armadura que hemos heredado de nuestros sabios y benditos predecesores».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Lo que muchos consideran que nos encadena y lastra en nuestro camino a la comprensión es una armadura que hemos heredado de nuestros sabios y benditos predecesores».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は真実だ。多くの人が理解への道のりを鎖でつないでいると考えているのは、知恵に恵まれた先人たちから受け継いだ鎧なのだ」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は真実だ。多くの人が理解への道のりを鎖でつないでいると考えているのは、知恵に恵まれた先人たちから受け継いだ鎧なのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Was viele als Ketten auf unserem Weg zum Verständnis ansehen, ist unsere Rüstung, die wir von unseren mit Weisheit gesegneten Vorgängern geerbt haben."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Was viele als Ketten auf unserem Weg zum Verständnis ansehen, ist unsere Rüstung, die wir von unseren mit Weisheit gesegneten Vorgängern geerbt haben."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Ce que beaucoup considèrent comme des chaînes sur la voie de la compréhension est en réalité notre armure, héritage de nos prédécesseurs touchés par la sagesse. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est vraie. Ce que beaucoup considèrent comme des chaînes sur la voie de la compréhension est en réalité notre armure, héritage de nos prédécesseurs touchés par la sagesse. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Birçoklarının idrak yolunda zincire vurulmak olarak değerlendirdiği şey, bizim için bir zırhtır. Bilgelikle kutsanmış atalarımızdan bize kalmış bir zırh."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. What many consider chains on our way to comprehension is our armour, which we have inherited from our wisdom-blessed predecessors."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Birçoklarının idrak yolunda zincire vurulmak olarak değerlendirdiği şey, bizim için bir zırhtır. Bilgelikle kutsanmış atalarımızdan bize kalmış bir zırh."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
